name: Lost Adventurers
description:
This is a small project I made with friends as the main characters.

I might expand on it later, but currently it is just something I made for fun.

It is currently a very simple game with simple RPG battles.

Some tips:

1. Characters start gaining skills on LVL 3

2. El Jayyed gets supports skills. His "Wide range" ability makes item effect spread to other party members, but only in battle.

3. Shini gets damage skills. His normal attack gives him a stacking buff. Utilizing his normal attack buff with his special skills makes him dangerous in battle.

3. Dream gets magic abilities. She starts off with a single target magic attack, and then gets a stronger magic that hits all enemies. Her normal attack is weaker than the others' but she gains MP with each attack.
